name: Dubstep Dubpad 2 - Skrillex style Music Sampler
name_original: Dubstep Dubpad 2 - Skrillex style Music Sampler
description: ntroducing a wonderful new mobile musical toy designed just for you. Create amazing Dubstep beats by merely pressing a button. Dubstep DubPad is easy to use and the beats sound incredible! We hope you enjoy all 45 unique sounds available to you including: basslines, drum loops, one shots, sound fx and synths. Also designed in this app is an easy way to categorize your beats through color coding. Enjoy creating powerful dubstep beats by simply touching the pads; supporting 11 different touches at once. Check out our app. Let us know if you have any suggestions
